Summary The ability to adapt and reinvent are priceless qualities in business, Gigi Capone is skilled in multiple facets of the music industry to a profound extent. Gigi worked as KRYC 105.9 FM's Assistant Program Director/On-Air Personality, Multimedia teacher for The Irshad Ali Foundation for Families & Children for 4+ years all-the-whilst operating her own small enterprise start up, d/b/a GiGi Capone PR & Associates, The Warrior Djs, iPlatinum Distribution and 7 Opus-Bleux Management Group.  
 
Gigi is an official San Francisco music examiner for examiner.com, a MusicXray.com A&R, correspondent/contributor for BREAL.TV and around 20+ other popular sites. GiGi's writing skills are well respected and have been described as excellent by her clients.  
 
Proudly GiGi maintains close relationships with her media colleagues and business associates, keeping her ear tuned to the beat. Having the best hands on experience available throughout the years, access to successful platinum selling mentors, always staying "​in the know"​ combined with her cutting edge tech skills are just a few of the elements that bring GiGi's work to life. 
 
GiGi worked many internships in her early career for major artists such as Wyclef Jean, Doitall “Du” Kelly, 40 Glocc and Warren G, in order to gain the experience she needed to compete in the aggressive and always evolving music industry market.  
 
GiGi completed Universal's label training in 2012, shortly after publishing her 1st release as iPlatinum Distribution.  
 
Current focuses include super producer Sedeck Jean, JMusiQ and The Warrior DJs.
